tweets.text: Back home last night. House is full of landfill gas, think i lost my waters, started contractions again and now I‚Äôm back on delivery suite. I AM 30 WEEKS! Fuming with @RedIndustries2 right now. @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids

@SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock @BorisJohnson Same, 9 tonight @AaronBell4NUL the EA response was inadequate now we need ministerial response from govt to put our health before permit breaching operators profits. #stopthestink

tweets.text:
@SuzVW @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA A message for the EA & PHE, we the communities of the borough Newcastle under Lyme  say NO to the acceptance of LFG in our homes, gardens, schools,  workplaces and everyday activities & way of life!
So go to the government and declare it a critical risk to health & get it sorted! https://t.co/CPE60J60V3

https://t.co/9vKapgSGUn tell people to email and then the email suddenly doesn't work.Something doesn't quite add up.A little like not having the monitoring stations plugged in on one of the worst weekends @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids #StopTheStink #notfitforpurpose @StinkStopthe https://t.co/qXVbNru1va

@ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk any of you out smelling this? Let me tell you inside my home is a million times worse than out there you are allowing us to be poisoned @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off CLOSE IT DOWN

The British Government need to clean this mess up @BorisJohnson Its clearly far beyond the abilities of @ClareDinnisEA @JamesBevanEA @EnvAgency Send an organ grinder down. We are fed up with your monkeys @Cap_it_off @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/xdXSqpSHSi

tweets.text: 4 mths ago the Stink visited us for the 1st time. 3 mths ago I rang @EnvAgency angry that I couldnt open windows at night. 2 mths ago my calls were about solid walls of gas outside my home. 1 mth ago calls to @EnvAgency were about smarting eyes, headaches, AND NOW I JUST WEEP.
@EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA @DefraGovUK @PHE_EoEngland @MattHancock @MPGeorgeEustice @BorisJohnson #stopthestink @capitoff @StinkStopthe https://t.co/JSx5T4gyq6

tweets.text: 2nd May and Walley‚Äôs Quarry run by @RedIndustries2 gases the entire town of Newcastle under Lyme. Reports across all villages through the night. This is ridiculous. We are not being protected, we are being ignored. We need air purifiers to sleep. #stopthestink https://t.co/lmTGlR4CqG

You can‚Äôt make this up. The email for reporting to the @EnvAgency has now ‚Äúbroken‚Äù so you need to call to report the stink. This is very convenient as most people have been told to email in; emails hold more sway in a court of law. @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA what is happening?

Dr. Neil Carman, published a study (2001) that concluded growing children are more vulnerable to hydrogen sulphide because they breathe more rapidly, taking in significantly more pollution than adults. @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe over 30 mins at 5 ppb INDOORS.
@ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids To you 'odour' is just a word, to us residents of North Staffordshire it is life and death.
@SianieRoo @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @PHE_EoEngland @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @MattHancock @BorisJohnson same @ClareDinnisEA be like https://t.co/DaLM8ajdMQ

tweets.text:
The @EnvAgency calculate that Affinity Water are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of about 430 million litres of water per day.

That's almost 10% of the world's total supply of chalk streams degraded for profit.

Let's talk about a clean conscience shall we. https://t.co/J8nQmVNWlv
Starting to feel like a weird dystopian reality - a parallel universe where only we can see what‚Äôs really going on @Cap_it_off @Cap_it_off @stopthestink #stopthestink https://t.co/OJ4DhphSfq
